<Link id="l00104" /><CodeLine lineNumber="104"><Highlight kind="normal">      <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/sys/#a96357e03675b273feb2112dabb891ada">sys::MemoryFence</a>();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00105" /><CodeLine lineNumber="105"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">while</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (tmp != <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a233737223c9a3dba810df5b91bc91d1fabbb9957d8adae962b153273c16bce571">Done</a>) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00106" /><CodeLine lineNumber="106"><Highlight kind="normal">        tmp = flag.<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/once-flag/#a82f54c87a27d58ef5f372cabf0fcbcfc">status</a>;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00107" /><CodeLine lineNumber="107"><Highlight kind="normal">        <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/sys/#a96357e03675b273feb2112dabb891ada">sys::MemoryFence</a>();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00108" /><CodeLine lineNumber="108"><Highlight kind="normal">      &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00109" /><CodeLine lineNumber="109"><Highlight kind="normal">    &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00110" /><CodeLine lineNumber="110"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/compiler-h/#a4a8a06812caf14bdec3b541b578b8344">TsanHappensAfter</a>(&amp;flag.<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/once-flag/#a82f54c87a27d58ef5f372cabf0fcbcfc">status</a>);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00111" /><CodeLine lineNumber="111"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="preprocessor">#endif</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00112" /><CodeLine lineNumber="112"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00113" /><CodeLine lineNumber="113"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00114" /><CodeLine lineNumber="114"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// This tells how a thread pool will be used</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00115" /><CodeLine lineNumber="115" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/threadpoolstrategy"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">class </Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/threadpoolstrategy">ThreadPoolStrategy</a> &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00116" /><CodeLine lineNumber="116"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">public</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">:</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00117" /><CodeLine lineNumber="117"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// The default value (0) means all available threads should be used,</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00118" /><CodeLine lineNumber="118"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// taking the affinity mask into account. If set, this value only represents</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00119" /><CodeLine lineNumber="119"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// a suggested high bound, the runtime might choose a lower value (not</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00120" /><CodeLine lineNumber="120"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// higher).</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00121" /><CodeLine lineNumber="121" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/threadpoolstrategy/#a40a8a25446e00b0d7eb5cc63884bea4e"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/threadpoolstrategy/#a40a8a25446e00b0d7eb5cc63884bea4e">ThreadsRequested</a> = 0;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00122" /><CodeLine lineNumber="122"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00123" /><CodeLine lineNumber="123"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// If SMT is active, use hyper threads. If false, there will be only one</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00124" /><CodeLine lineNumber="124"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// std::thread per core.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00125" /><CodeLine lineNumber="125" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/threadpoolstrategy/#a4d05cc9321306f401f9cc9990720173b"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">bool</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/threadpoolstrategy/#a4d05cc9321306f401f9cc9990720173b">UseHyperThreads</a> = </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">true</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00126" /><CodeLine lineNumber="126"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00127" /><CodeLine lineNumber="127"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// If set, will constrain &#39;ThreadsRequested&#39; to the number of hardware</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00128" /><CodeLine lineNumber="128"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// threads, or hardware cores.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00129" /><CodeLine lineNumber="129" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/threadpoolstrategy/#a006386e2fc403bf7964952c2d97432a8"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">bool</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/threadpoolstrategy/#a006386e2fc403bf7964952c2d97432a8">Limit</a> = </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">false</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00131" /><CodeLine lineNumber="131"><Highlight kind="comment">    /// Retrieves the max available threads for the current strategy. This</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00132" /><CodeLine lineNumber="132"><Highlight kind="comment">    /// accounts for affinity masks and takes advantage of all CPU sockets.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00138" /><CodeLine lineNumber="138"><Highlight kind="comment">    /// compute&#95;thread&#95;count()).</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00146" /><CodeLine lineNumber="146"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// Build a strategy from a number of threads as a string provided in \\p Num.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00147" /><CodeLine lineNumber="147"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// When Num is above the max number of threads specified by the \\p Default</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00148" /><CodeLine lineNumber="148"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// strategy, we attempt to equally allocate the threads on all CPU sockets.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00149" /><CodeLine lineNumber="149"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// &quot;0&quot; or an empty string will return the \\p Default strategy.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00150" /><CodeLine lineNumber="150"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// &quot;all&quot; for using all hardware threads.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00205" /><CodeLine lineNumber="205" lineLink="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a879dd68b6ab547079c3ef8b7a7e39277"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">inline</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/threadpoolstrategy">ThreadPoolStrategy</a> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a879dd68b6ab547079c3ef8b7a7e39277">optimal&#95;concurrency</a>(</Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> TaskCount = 0) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00212" /><CodeLine lineNumber="212"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// Return the current thread id, as used in various OS system calls.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00213" /><CodeLine lineNumber="213"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// Note that not all platforms guarantee that the value returned will be</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00214" /><CodeLine lineNumber="214"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// unique across the entire system, so portable code should not assume</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00215" /><CodeLine lineNumber="215"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// this.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00216" /><CodeLine lineNumber="216"><Highlight kind="normal">  uint64&#95;t <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#aaa33daad43dedada2aa398a44b91be01">get&#95;threadid</a>();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00217" /><CodeLine lineNumber="217"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00218" /><CodeLine lineNumber="218"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// Get the maximum length of a thread name on this platform.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00219" /><CodeLine lineNumber="219"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// A value of 0 means there is no limit.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00220" /><CodeLine lineNumber="220"><Highlight kind="normal">  uint32&#95;t <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a28e648caeff381f571c4f282c869ccd7">get&#95;max&#95;thread&#95;name&#95;length</a>();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00221" /><CodeLine lineNumber="221"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00222" /><CodeLine lineNumber="222"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// Set the name of the current thread.  Setting a thread&#39;s name can</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00223" /><CodeLine lineNumber="223"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// be helpful for enabling useful diagnostics under a debugger or when</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00224" /><CodeLine lineNumber="224"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// logging.  The level of support for setting a thread&#39;s name varies</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00225" /><CodeLine lineNumber="225"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// wildly across operating systems, and we only make a best effort to</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00226" /><CodeLine lineNumber="226"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// perform the operation on supported platforms.  No indication of success</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00227" /><CodeLine lineNumber="227"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// or failure is returned.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00228" /><CodeLine lineNumber="228"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">void</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a8c2b8c55bed6ebcda541d21bab7e6a42">set&#95;thread&#95;name</a>(</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> Twine &amp;Name);</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00255" /><CodeLine lineNumber="255" lineLink="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a05609d049bfe3c5c2f64711566131a86aa9ded1e5ce5d75814730bb4caaf49419"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a05609d049bfe3c5c2f64711566131a86aa9ded1e5ce5d75814730bb4caaf49419">Background</a> = 0,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00256" /><CodeLine lineNumber="256"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00257" /><CodeLine lineNumber="257"><Highlight kind="comment">    /// Lower the current thread&#39;s priority such that it does not affect</Highlight></CodeLine>
